      • DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE_MSEC

        public static final int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE_MSEC
        Recommended default sub window size of subwindows on which features are extracted. Value is 40.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_WINDOW_SHIFT_MSEC

        public static final int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SHIFT_MSEC
        Recommended default window shift size when extracting subwindows for feature extraction. 0 should indicate rolling windows. Value is 20.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF_PROPERTY_NAME

        public static final String DEFAULT_UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF_PROPERTY_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF

        public static final double DEFAULT_UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF
        Used for determining the threshold for detecting known vs. unknown. The threshold is set as UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF multiplied by the minimum density (the sum density from the single GMMs for each model), where the minimum is among the densities of all training sound clips. A sound is classified as unknown when its density is below the threshold. The value UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF needs to be >= 0.0. A larger value of UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF gives a higher sensitivity of unknown sound detection, i.e., more sounds will be detected as unknown. When UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF = 0.0, unknown detection is completely turned off. When UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF = 1.0, we have the highest sensitivity such that all the training samples (i.e. known sounds from training data) are classified as known. When UNKNOWN_THRESH_COEFF > 1.0, some training samples (i.e. known sounds from training data) are classified as unknown. Default is 0.01.

      • DEFAULT_FEATURE_EXTRACTOR

        public static final IFeatureExtractor<double[],double[]> DEFAULT_FEATURE_EXTRACTOR
        Defines the default feature extractor to use. Default is a MFCCFeatureExtractor constructed with the constructor, MFCCFeatureExtractor.MFCCFeatureExtractor(20).

      • DEFAULT_TRANSFORMS

        public static final ITrainingWindowTransform<double[]> DEFAULT_TRANSFORMS

      • DEFAULT_FEATURE_PROCESSOR

        public static final IFeatureProcessor<double[]> DEFAULT_FEATURE_PROCESSOR
        Defines the default feature processor to use. Default is not use a feature processor.

      • DEFAULT_USE_DIAGONAL_COVARIANCE

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_USE_DIAGONAL_COVARIANCE
        If true, a diagonal covariance matrix is used; else use full covariance matrix. Value is true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_USE_DISK_CACHE

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_USE_DISK_CACHE
        Defines whether by default the disk cache should be used when training. Value is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_NUM_GAUSSIANS

        public static final int DEFAULT_NUM_GAUSSIANS
        Defines the number of Gaussians in the mixture model. Value is 8.
        See Also:

      • GMMClassifier

        public GMMClassifier(ITrainingWindowTransform<double[]> transforms,
                     IFeatureExtractor<double[],double[]> extractor,
                     IFeatureProcessor<double[]> featureProcessor,
                     int windowSizeMsec,
                     int windowShiftMsec,
                     boolean useDiskCache,
                     int numGaussiansToMix,
                     boolean diagonalCovariance,
                     double unknownThreshCoeff)
        Constructor for GMMClassifier.
        Parameters:
        transforms -
        extractor - feature extractor
        featureProcessor - feature processor
        windowSizeMsec - size of subwindow in milliseconds
        windowShiftMsec - shift of subwindow in milliseconds
        useDiskCache - set to true for large data sets, otherwise set to false to use a memory cache on small data sets.
        numGaussiansToMix - Defines the number of Gaussians in the mixture model.
        diagonalCovariance - If true, a diagonal covariance matrix is used; else use full covariance matrix.
        knownConfidenceCutoff - Used for determining the threshold for detecting known vs. unknown. See DEFAULT_KNOWN_CONFIDENCE_CUTOFF for details.

    • Method Detail

      • trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures

        protected IFixedClassifier<double[]> trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures(Iterable<? extends ILabeledFeatureGram<double[]>[]> labeledFeatureGrams)
                                                             throws AISPException
        Description copied from class: AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier
        Build the classifier from the given set of features. If this is called, then the iterable has at least one feature array in it. AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier.primaryTrainingLabel has been set to the value passed to AbstractFixableClassifier.train(String, Iterable) when this is called and should be used by the implementation to define the labels on which the model is trained.
        Specified by:
        trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures in class AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier<double[],double[]>
        Parameters:
        labeledFeatureGrams - the iterable over arrays of labeled features. Each array of features corresponds to an individual training sample as provided to AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier.trainFixedClassifierOnData(String, Iterable) as part of the iterable provided there.
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        AISPException
